mainEntity.name: Do new hires need OSHA training on their first day?

acceptedAnswer.text: While not all roles require full OSHA 10 certification immediately, OSHA mandates that employees receive appropriate safety training before exposure to workplace hazards.

mainEntity.name: What should an OSHA compliance kit include for new employees?

acceptedAnswer.text: A solid OSHA kit often includes PPE, safety orientation materials, compliance posters, hazard communication training, and certification tracking tools.

mainEntity.name: Can I use online OSHA training to onboard warehouse or field employees?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes — many workplaces use accredited online OSHA courses, often paired with in-person walkthroughs, to meet compliance and save time.
